summary: Autistic: pattern recognition, detail, logic. ADHD: hyperfocus, creativity, problem-solving. Dyslexia: spatial, big-picture, lateral thinking.
details: Autistic excel at math/logic, structured systems. ADHD show hyperfocus on interesting tasks, seek sensory stimulation, need movement for concentration. Dyslexic demonstrate advanced spatial reasoning, creativity, lateral thinking - Richard Branson credits dyslexia for creative advantage. Code rewards these strengths: clear literal instructions (no social ambiguity), pattern recognition, visual structure. Block-based (Scratch) â†’ Python transition works well.
